explains: adj. 令人愤慨的，可耻的；丑闻的

sentences.en: It is scandalous that he has not been punished.
sentences.cn: 他没有受到惩罚，天理难容啊。

sentences.en: Newspaper columns were full of scandalous tales.
sentences.cn: 报纸专栏上尽是与丑闻有关的故事。

sentences.en: They would be sacked for criminal or scandalous behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他们会因犯罪行为或不道德的行为而遭解雇。
